sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import Logo from '../images/logo.svg' class Course extends React.Component{ state = { //User user_id: null, firstname: null, lastname: null, user_role: null, //Course course_name: null } componentDidMount(){ //Get User ID from Local Storage this.setState({user_id: localStorage.getItem('user_id')}) //User Info with Axios.get axios.get(`http://localhost:4000/users/${localStorage.getItem('user_id')}`) .then(response => this.setState({ firstname: response.data[0].firstname, lastname: response.data[0].lastname, user_role: response.data[0].user_role, user_id: response.data[0].user_id } )) .catch(error => console.log(error)) //Course Info with Axios.get axios.get(`http://localhost:4000/courses/${this.props.match.params.id}`) .then(response => this.setState({ course_name: response.data[0].course_name } )) .catch(error => console.log(error)) } render(){ return(

{this.state.firstname} {this.state.lastname}

{this.state.user_role}

COURSES
{this.state.course_name}

Course Editor View

New Objective
Select what to search by
Option 1
Option 2
LEARNING OBJECTIVE DOMAIN BLOOM VERBS ACTIVITES
Latin has no def articles... Syntax Recall, Know 3 EDIT
Nouns vary by gender Syntax Recall, Know 5
Nouns vary by person Syntax Recall, Know 3
) } } export default Course;
